name: Kingdom Raids
description: Kingdom Raids is a blockchain-based strategy Role-playing game (RPG) developed by a leading gaming studio, TAG Labs. The game take place in a fictional kingdom, “Dood Kingdom”, a land of mystery and adventure with over 40 heroes in the mystic world, each possessing unique abilities. Kingdom Raids will offer various in-game activities for players such as Player versus player (PvP) and Player versus environment (PvE). Join us in exploring dungeons, battling tournaments, and building clans.
